Table.Name: WebServices
Table.Command: select w.id, Type, Url, CheckUrl, TimeCheck from WebServices w join Services s on w.id = s.id
delete from WebServices where Id = @Id delete from Services where Id = @Id

Table.Name: Denials
Table.Command: select Id, ServiceId, StartWorking, Time from Denials
begin tran if not exists (select * from Denials where Id = @Id) begin insert into Denials values (@Id, @ServiceId, @StartWorking, @Time) end commit tran
